channel.title: CVE Feed for 360 Security Technology, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for 360 Security Technology, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-19031|2024-08-05T11:23:09.028Z -- 360%20security%20technology%2C%20inc. -- 360%20safe%20router
item.description: A command injection vulnerability exists when the authorized user passes crafted parameter to background process in the router. This affects 360 router series products (360 Safe Router P0,P1,P2,P3,P4), the affected version is V2.0.61.58897.
